112112111211.content:
You do consider the mother for a moment, but the sight of her huge black pumps, nearly identical to the ones you just spent nearly an hour inside, raises to much of an aversion. Your nostrils still are filled with the smell of your mom's foot sweat.

Instead, you turn and head over to the little girl who's looming (although not nearly as high) over in the distance in the corner. She's wearing blue overalls and a light green shirt, with braided blonde hair in pigtails. The back of her head and the broad expanse of her back, leaning away from you into the corner she's kneeling in, are about all you can see of her, she’s humming to herself quietly to herself and seems to be playing with something on the floor in front of her. Hopefully something you can join in one.

You haven't had much experience with little girls, or anyone else for that matter, except for Julie, and that didn't give you much insight. When Julie was a little girl and was made to "play" with you, it usually involved her sticking you somewhere... unpleasant, often trapped on a piece of used gum, rather than letting you play with her previous toys.

The thought did make you a bit nervous and you slowed down on your jog towards the corner for a second, but you steeled yourself- nothing bad would happen while the girl was in the room with her own mother, after all. Besides, today was supposed to be your first day of school, and you were supposed to be meeting new people. If you couldn't meet someone your own age, at least you'd meet this younger person, a chance for a real meeting not supervised by your often overbearing Mom.

The little girl loomed larger and larger, filling the world in front of your 2 inch body. Finally you stopped just behind her, her butt leaning back on her heels looming overhead, body blocking out all of your vision in front. Just as you draw in a breath to yell, you experience a moment of pure terror as her butt suddenly comes hurtling towards you, faster than you can blink.

You let out a very undignified squeak and fall backwards as the massive, rounded blue wall lurches towards you. You land on your rear and start crab-scooting away, but it’s her but has already stopped moving towards you- the girl had just sat up and leaned back a little, taking a break or something. As your heartbeat pounds, gradually slowing, you realize your foolish error- Mom and Julie were always careful in your house (relatively, at least), knowing the possibility that you might be around. This girl had no idea you were there.

You had already spent too long today trapped in your mom’s shoe- you aren’t about to risk spending more of it trapped underneath a little girls’ bum. Time to act.

Steeling yourself and drawing in breath again (from a slightly safer distance), you let out your loudest yell:

“H-Hey! Down Here! Hello!!!” You’re yelling at the top of your lungs, and your voice can be quite piercing if you try, so within moments the head far above you jerks and starts looking around wildly. Encouraged, you begin gesticulating wildly with your arms:

“Down here!!” You scream again. She finally starts looking down and around her, and very quickly her eyes lock on your tiny form. They squint, for a moment, then widen, quickly into 2 huge Os. She’s still for a moment, and you try to seize the initiative:

“Hi, My name’s Mark, what’s your-“ Your words are cut off as a giant hand shoots out and encircles you, crushing you into her sealed fist. You’re surrounded by her flesh, although unharmed- her squeezing is just enough to totally immobilize you, not enough to hurt. You have just enough time to start doubting your choice of person to approach before you rapidly feel the bottom of your stomach drop out. You can tell you’re zooming into the air, but of course can’t see or hear anything, which is extremely disorienting. Julie and mom usually pick you up far more gently than this, and ask first.

As quickly as your roller-coast began, it ends. The hand opens up; blinding you momentarily, then you find yourself looking out across the boring office room at a considerably greater height than previously. You shakily get to your feet, stumbling a little from your dizziness and the slightly yielding surface of the palm below you, and slowly turn around – only to be confronted by the girl’s giant nose right in front of you, and still-rounded eyes looming directly overhead- the girl has her palm right up to her face.

The shock is too much, and you fall over again, although the palm is much softer then the floor was previously. The girl lets out a few giggles at your apparent antics, air blowing too and fro over your body and ruffling your clothes to a great degree with her nostrils so close. Suddenly, she stops giggling, and her nose starts to wrinkle. She takes another few, more delicate sniffs and her face screws up entirely. Before you can say anything, she suddenly thrusts her hand away from her face, disorienting you yet again as you hang on for dear life to the fleshy surface below you.

Held now at a safe distance, you try to muster yourself to speak again, despite this poor first impression. Clearly, the foot smell that still fills your nose was also quite detectable by your current holder. Not a good start, but you think it shouldn’t be a problem, although you ruefully admit it might have been better to stay with your mom bored on her desk. As the girls’ face smooths out again and she looks towards you again curiously, it finally occurs to you to wonder exactly who this girl is, and how she’s going to take meeting a 2-inch person.

Who is this girl, and how’s she going to interact with you?

"Ahh!" you shout, startled.
"Good morning mark!" she says brightly. You are confused; you thought this room was not an open one. "Its time to get up." she withdraws her head and reaches for your blanket.
"Molly, please don't!" You yell at her, panic filling your voice. You really don't want her to see you in your undies.
"Why!" she asks, curious. Her massive hand has stopped, but it is still too close to the bed for comfort. "Please, just turn around." You say, trying to keep your head only over the covers. She is confused, but then comprehension spreads across her face. She blushes as well, and then stands up turns around, her massive back filing your view. You reach for your clothes and scramble into them. "You can look now" you shout at her. She turns back around. It is morning, and she has changed out of her pajamas, and brushed her teeth from the mint smell of her breath. The wall that you thought was a permanent fixture was the one that looked out onto the room. Across the sea-like blue carpet you see the massive door, big even at this distance. Molly got back on her knees, at a comfortable distance so you can see most of her face.
“Sorry Mark” she says, sounding apologetic. She sounds sincere, and she probably didn’t know what you were in anyways. You stand up. Your weight does not make much of an impression on the bed. You use the blanket as a short slide and get off the bed. You only come up to the wooden frame. You would not even have to duck very far to get under the bed. She has lost most of her baby fat, but she looks all of her 8 years.

“Grandma made all four walls and the ceiling removable. This house seems a bit big for you.” She says the last with some curiosity tingeing her voice.
“Yeah, I’m too small. The dolls must have been at least 6 inches tall.” You speak this comment, hoping she can hear you this close. To your relief, she can. You were getting a bit hoarse from yelling to be heard.

You've become pretty tired of being the center of

Julie presses you close. "It's my fault," your
sister says. "It's all my fault. I should never
have let you eat with him." And, with all eyes in
the room staring at the two of you, she carries
you out the
1212221112112.title: Enter Craig Bradley

choices: You go looking for Mrs. Andrews.
12122211121122.content:
She carries you out the door.

Julie hurries you to a quiet spot behind a set of
lockers. She holds you up to her face. "Listen
to me," she says, "Stay away from that Craig guy.
Do you hear me? Stay away from him!" You are
still too dazed to respond. "What is the matter
with you?" she cries, shaking you in her fist.
“Snap out of it!” She flicks her finger against
your cheek, which for you is the equivalent of a
hard slap in the face.

"Oww!" you cry, writhing in her fist. "You jerk!"
Leave it to your sister to knock sense back into
you.

"You're the jerk," she replies. "You're so dumb
you don't even know when you're in trouble. So
listen! You remember how scared you were of Mrs.
Plunkett's cat at Hadley Beach? Well, this guy is
ten times worse than that cat. Twenty times. So
do what I tell you. What’s your next class?”

“How should I know?”

“God, but you’re helpless!” she says, as she pulls
out of her pocket a copy of your class schedule.
"Let's see ... your next class is Miss Beasley's
English, and after that you've got Mr. Lorenzo.
Okay. I'll take you now over to Beasley's, then
you get a student to take you to Lorenzo's. But
once Lorenzo’s class is over, don’t move. You
wait for me there. Get me? Wait for me there,
and I'll pick you up when Mom comes. Get me?"

"Yeah, yeah, yeah. I get you!”

“I hope so.” she says, as she drops you into her
shirt pocket and walks you to your next class.
There she finds another desk your size waiting for
you on the teacher's desk. She pulls you out of
her pocket and holds you up to her face again.
“Remember, after Lorenzo’s class you wait for me
there. You wait for me there.”

“Okay, okay!” you cry, “I'm not an idiot."

"Then stop acting like one," she says. She looks
at you pensively for a moment, kisses you lightly
on the head, and puts you in your desk. “See you
later,” she says, and as she walks out the door,
adds, “and quit the goofy stuff!"

Oh, at times like this, how you wish you could be
seven feet tall instead of two inches tall. How
you wish you could tower over your sister. Then
maybe she wouldn’t be so bossy. Then again, you
think to yourself, maybe she still would.


You don't mind sitting atop Miss Beasley's desk,
since there is enough clutter on it to keep you
from being the center of attention. Besides, as
soon as the plump and aging Miss Beasley appears,
you realize that looking for fifty minutes at her
bloated feet would not be the most thrilling of
experiences.

That thought triggers in you a return in thought
to Mrs. Andrews. Soon the drone of Miss Beasley's
voice fades into the background, as you fall deep
into a daydream. Mrs. Andrews is at your summer
place in Hadley Beach, wearing a two piece bathing
suit, sunglasses, and straw hat. She walks across
the sand, spreads out her beach towel close to the
water, and sets herself on it. After she applies
an ample amount of lotion on her skin, she lies on
her stomach and falls asleep. You creep up to her
feet, and meditate on her exposed soles. You dare
to climb up one of them and roll down, which must
tickle her, for her other foot comes over to brush
you off. That was a little dangerous, you figure.
So you content yourself to nestle onto the curled
underside of her toes, where you fall asleep. And
there you lie, for the remainder of Miss Beasley's
class. The spell of Mrs. Andrews has again taken
hold of you.

At the sound of the bell, an overweight boy with a
pimply chin offers to take you to your next class,
and grabs you in his sweaty hand. Another desk is
waiting for you when you arrive at Mr. Lorenzo's.
You sit in the desk, and try hard to pay attention
to algebra, but just cannot shake off your mental
picture of Mrs. Andrews. When the class finally
ends, and the other students rush out, Mr. Lorenzo
offers to take you to your next destination. You
only ask that he set you down onto the floor; he
does so, and returns to his desk.

You remember what Julie said: stay in Mr Lorenzo's
classroom until she comes for you. But maybe she
won't be arriving for a few minutes. And maybe in
those few minutes you could sneak down the hall to
catch a quick look into Mrs. Andr

1212221112112211.title: Helping mum

121222111211222.content:
But maybe she won't be arriving for a few minutes.
And maybe in those few minutes you could sneak
down the hall to catch a quick look into Mrs.
Andrew's room. Hmmm....

Julie wouldn't be angry with your decision, if she
only realized how little in control you are at the
moment. Some force beyond your will is compelling
you to walk down this corridor, is drawing you in
the direction of Mrs. Andrews' room, despite your
better judgment. The way you feel right now, the
way you feel about Mrs. Andrews, is a feeling you
have never felt before in all your life.

You turn the corner and enter into the wing where
Mrs. Andrews' room is. It's a wing furthest from
the main activity of the school, and her room is
furthest down on the left side. The entire place
quite frankly looks abandoned. Still, she could
be there at her desk, doing papers or something,
just the same.

You walk along the wall, regularly passing by the
threshhold of one empty room after another. You
think maybe you see a light in Mrs. Andrews' room,
but can't be sure; the sun is on that side of the
building. You think maybe you hear a sound in her
room, but it could simply be the wind rustling the
blinds. You get closer, until now you are only a
couple of rooms away.

Then you hear someone speaking.
121222111211222.title: Down the Corridor

1212221112112221.content:
"Mark, you little angel you, where are you going?" asks the beautiful voice behind you. You turn around to see two giant black high heel pumps in front of you. It's Mrs. Andrews!

You can only utter the word, "Hi" to your teacher. She takes you up in her hand and you try to explain to her that you were going into her classroom to see her. She smiles and carries you into her classroom.

"Mark, my next class will be coming in soon, and if I am correct, you have a free period next right?" Mrs. Andrews asks as you sit indian-style on your teacher's palm. You nod your head and smile.

"Well, tell you what Mark, you can either stay with me, or go ahead and explore the school. You need anything, come straight to me okay. Again you nod your head, but what will you do? Stay with Mrs. Andrews or explore the school on your free period.
1212221112112221.title: Running into Mrs. Andrews.

1212221112112222.content:
"Hey Bud, how do you turn a Mark on the floor into
a permanent mark on the floor?"

"I dunno -- how?"

"Like this!"

You turn around and look up to see a giant sneaker
bearing down on you. You leap out of the way just
in time, and just enough, as you see the sneaker
stomp down on the ground next to you.

"Ah Craig, you missed!"

Oh no! Craig Bradley and his buddies!

"That's okay. Maybe we shouldn't make a permanent
mark on the floor. Maybe we just oughta wipe him
out -- like this."

The sneaker in front of you hauls back and kicks
you high in the air. You crash onto a section of
broken tile. Before you have time even to breath,
it kicks you again, skidding you across the broken
tile and grout. You look up and see a second shoe
kick you back. The two kick you back and forth,
until you hear, "Hey, let me in on this!" and now
three shoes are taking turns kicking you up and
down the hall.

Then the kicking stops. You lay there unable to
move. You feel blood oozing under your clothes.
Then you hear Craig's voice: "You know, this is
wrong. We shouldn't be torturing him like this.
I really ought to do what I tried doing in the
beginning, and just put him out-of-his-misery."

His sneaker slowly bears down on you, only this
time you're unable to get away. The sneaker now
presses down on you harder, harder, harder. As
you gasp more and more for breath, and feel your
every bone close to the breaking point, you hear
his buddies egging Craig on, chanting like some
chorus of jungle apes: "Ooo! -- Ooo! -- Ooo! --
Ooo! -- Ooo! -- Ooo! -- Ooo! -- Ooo! -- Ooo!..."

Then, just you feel yourself beginning to pass
out, you hear ...
1212221112112222.title: Helpless

choices: She leaves you to get help.
She stays to attend to you.
12122211121122222.content:
"What in the world is going on out here?"

It's a woman's voice, but whose? You turn your
head just enough to see down the hall a shapely
set of ankles, with feet shod in a pair of black
high heeled shoes. Mrs. Andrews!

"Uh ... nothing ... nothing." Craig replies, as he
lifts his foot off of you and backs away, exposing
you to her view. Bad move, Craig.

"What ... is ... this ...?" says Mrs. Andrews, as
you see her feet move up closer, then hear a gasp.
You see one of her knees hit the floor in front of
you, and realize that she has dropped to that knee
to attend to you. "Nothing? Dear God! You call
this nothing? What were you doing to him?"

"Nothing ... I mean ... just playing."

"No. No, this isn't playing. This is more like,
... it's like ... you were trying to kill him.
You wanted to to kill him!"

"No, Mrs. Andrews, no!" Craig cries, as he steps
toward her.

"Stay away!" she yells. "Stay away from him!"

He backs up, but still tries pleading with her.
"But ... Mrs. Andrews ..."

"Just go!" she cries, "Go!"

Craig's voice sounds desparate. "But I..."

"Leave!" she screams. Craig's two buddies pull
him away, and forcibly lead him down the hall,
until all three of them are out of sight.
12122211121122222.title: In the Nick of Time
